FM meets Nigerian ambassador
articles.content:
FM meets Nigerian ambassador
   Pyongyang, November 11 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, Minister of Foreign Affairs, met and had a talk yesterday with Adoga Onah, ambassador of the Federal Republic of Nigeria to the DPRK, who paid a farewell call on him.

articles.title: DPRK ambassador to Libya appointed
articles.content:
DPRK ambassador to Libya appointed
     Pyongyang, November 11 (KCNA) -- Choe In Sop was appointed as DPRK Ambassador E.P. to the Great Socialist People's Libyan Arab Jamahiriya, according to a decree of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.
